properties.name: Blur UI Showcase
properties.description:
A Simple project showcasing a ui element with its background 
blurred witth the option to toggle between dynamic and static blur

objects.name: NewText
objects.string:
Blur Demo
Double Tap to 
toggle between
static blur and 
dynamic blur

content.text:
Blur Demo
Double Tap to 
toggle between
static blur and 
dynamic blur

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Silver-Streak
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DoubleClick
eventsFunctionsExtensions.previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Computers and Hardware/Computers and Hardware_mouse_wireless_pc.svg
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Check for a double-click with a mouse, or a double-tap on a touchscreen.
description: Allow you to check for double-clicks with the left, middle, or right button of a mouse. It will also allow you to detect double-taps on touchscreens.

Please note: Touch devices do not have alternatives for middle/right clicks. Taps on a touch device will get counted for _any_ use of these conditions, so you should either design your controls accordingly, or build out separate events if the device has a touch screen.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified mouse button is clicked twice in a short amount of time.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Double-clicked (or double-tapped)
eventsFunctions.name: HasDoubleClicked
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM1_ mouse button is double-clicked (or double-tap on a touchscreen)

parameters.longDescription: As touch devices do not have middle/right tap equivalents, you will need to account for this within your events if you're not using the left mouse button and building for touch devices.
parameters.name: MouseButton

eventsFunctions.description: Set the maximum delay between two clicks (or two taps) to be considered as a double click.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set the double click delay
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the double-click maximum delay between two clicks (or two taps) to _PARAM1_s

parameters.longDescription: By default, this value is 0.5 seconds.
parameters.name: MaxDelay

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: VegeTato, arthuro555
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RepeatEveryXSeconds
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Trigger an event every X seconds.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Convenience conditions, actions and behaviors for timers to trigger a condition every X seconds.

parameters.description: Duration in seconds between each repetition

parameters.longDescription: Maximum nuber of repetition (-1 to repeat forever).

eventsFunctions.description: Pauses a recurring timer.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SpriteMasking
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use a sprite or a shape painter to mask another object.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: When masked, the masked object is only visible through the mask.

eventsFunctions.description: Define a shape painter as a mask of an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mask an object with a shape painter
eventsFunctions.name: MaskWithShapePainter

parameters.description: Shape painter to use as a mask
parameters.name: Mask

eventsFunctions.description: Define a sprite as a mask of an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mask an object with a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: Mask

parameters.description: Sprite object to use as a mask
parameters.name: Mask

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the mask of the specified object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remove the mask
eventsFunctions.name: Unmask

parameters.description: Object with a mask to remove
parameters.name: Masked

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RenderToSprite
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Renders an object, layer, scene or an area of a scene and puts the resulting image into a sprite.
description: Allows rendering (creating an image) of objects, layers and the scene to display in a sprite.
This allows to make optimizations by transforming the resulting image of a shape painter into a faster sprite, or to make viewports/cameras.

eventsFunctions.description: Renders an object and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render an object into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderObject

inlineCode: // Reset position so that it is not offscreen while rendering
const { x: originalX, y: originalY } = source.position;
const { width, height, x, y } = source.getLocalBounds();
// Ensure the target is a RenderTexture of the correct size

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a layer and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render a layer into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderLayer

inlineCode: // Ensure the target is a RenderTexture of the correct size
// Prerender to a temporary texture to prevent WebGL erroring out.
// Ensure the original width/heigth is restored

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a scene and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render a scene into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderScene
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the current scene into sprite _PARAM1_

inlineCode: // Ensure the target is a RenderTexture of the correct size
// Prerender to a temporary texture to prevent WebGL erroring out.
// Ensure the original width/heigth is restored

eventsFunctions.description: Renders a defined area of a scene and puts the rendered image into a sprite object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Render an area of a scene into a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: RenderSceneArea
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the area of a current scene into Sprite: _PARAM1_, from OriginX: _PARAM2_, OriginY: _PARAM3_, with Width: _PARAM4_, Height: _PARAM5_

inlineCode: // Ensure the target is a RenderTexture of the correct size
// Prerender to a temporary texture to prevent WebGL erroring out.
// Ensure the original width/heigth is restored

parameters.description: Origin X position of the render area
parameters.name: originPositionX

parameters.description: Origin Y Position of the render area
parameters.name: originPositionY

parameters.description: Width of the are to render
parameters.name: areaWidth

parameters.description: Height of the area to render
parameters.name: areaHeight
